tips.title: 专转 砖转砖
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+,` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+,` (macOS) 驻转转 专转 砖转砖. 转 砖转 转 转 VS Code!

tips.title: 专转 拽爪专 拽转
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+K Ctrl+S` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Cmd+S` (macOS) 驻转转 专转 拽爪专 拽转. 转 砖转  爪驻  拽爪专!

tips.title: 专 砖专
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+X` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+X` (macOS)  专 专转 砖专 . 专转 砖专 专!

tips.title: 注转拽 砖专
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+C` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+C` (macOS)  专 注转拽转 砖专 . 注转拽转 砖专 专!

tips.title: 拽 砖专
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+Shift+K` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+Shift+K` (macOS) 拽转 砖专 转. 专 转专 专 拽!

tips.title: 住 砖专 转转
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+Enter` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+Enter` (macOS) 住转 砖专 砖 转转 砖专 转.  爪专 注 住祝 拽!

tips.title: 住 砖专 注
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+Shift+Enter` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+Shift+Enter` (macOS) 住转 砖专 砖 注 砖专 转!

tips.title: 拽驻抓 住专 转
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+Shift+\` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+Shift+\` (macOS) 拽驻爪 住专 转.   拽 专转!

tips.title: 转转/住祝 砖专
tips.content: 抓 `Home` 转 转转 砖专 -`End` 转 住祝.  专 砖专!

tips.title: 转转/住祝 拽抓
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+Home` 转 转转 拽抓 -`Ctrl+End` 转 住祝 (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+Home` / `Cmd+End` (macOS)!

tips.title: 砖专 注/
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+Up`  `Ctrl+Down` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+Up` / `Cmd+Down` (macOS) 转 转爪 砖专 转   转 住!

tips.title: 注 注/
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Alt+PgUp`  `Alt+PgDn` (Windows/Linux)  `Option+PgUp` / `Option+PgDn` (macOS) 转 转爪 注 !

tips.title: 拽驻 转  转转-专
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+K Ctrl+[` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Cmd+[` (macOS) 拽驻 (爪爪)  转转-专 专 !

tips.title: 驻专砖 转  转转-专
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+K Ctrl+]` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Cmd+]` (macOS) 驻专住 (专) 砖  转转-专 专 !

tips.title: 拽驻 转  专
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+K Ctrl+0` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Cmd+0` (macOS) 拽驻 (爪爪)  专 拽抓. 注专 转  拽 拽!

tips.title: 驻专砖 转  专
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+K Ctrl+J` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Cmd+J` (macOS) 驻专住 (专) 砖  专 拽抓. 专 转  拽 拽!

tips.title: 住祝 注专转 砖专
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+K Ctrl+C` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Cmd+C` (macOS) 住驻转 注专转 砖专. 注专 注 住驻专 砖专转!

tips.title: 住专 注专转 砖专
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+K Ctrl+U` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Cmd+U` (macOS) 住专转 注专转 砖专.  注专 注 住驻专 砖专转!

tips.title: 驻注/ 注专转 拽
tips.content: 抓 `Shift+Alt+A` (Windows/Linux)  `Shift+Option+A` (macOS) 驻注转/ 注专转 拽. 砖转砖 注专转 住 /* */!

tips.title: 砖专
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+G` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+G` (macOS) 驻转转   砖专. 拽驻抓  住驻专 砖专 专转!

tips.title: 砖
tips.content: 抓 `F8`  砖  专  拽. 转拽 注转 注转!

tips.title: 砖 拽转
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Shift+F8`  砖  专 拽转 拽. 住拽专 转  注转!

tips.title: 驻注/ Tab  拽
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+M` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+M` (macOS) 驻注/  Tab  拽  住 转 . 转转 砖转!

tips.title: 砖专 爪 转爪 拽 驻转
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+K Enter` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K Enter` (macOS) 砖专转 注专 爪 转爪 拽 驻转 驻 拽注. 注 住专转 砖转 注转!

tips.title: 注转拽 转 拽抓 驻注
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+K P` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K P` (macOS) 注转拽转 转 拽抓 驻注 . 砖转祝 拽 拽爪 拽转!

tips.title: 砖祝 拽抓 住专
tips.content: 砖转砖 -`Ctrl+K R` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K R` (macOS) 砖驻转 拽抓 驻注 住专 拽爪 砖 注专转. 爪 拽爪 注专转!

tips.title: 爪 拽抓  砖
tips.content: 抓 `Ctrl+K O` (Windows/Linux)  `Cmd+K O` (macOS) 爪转 拽抓 驻注 /驻注 砖. 注 注 转 拽抓 住驻专 转!
